Name: Lungi Ngidi
Teams: South Africa, South Africa U19, Titans, South Africa A, Benoni Zalmi, Chennai Super Kings, Tshwane Spartans, World XI, Welsh Fire
Bio: Lungi Ngidi can reach speeds in the 140s kph  is as comfortable opening the bowling as he is at the death,making him one of South Africa's most promising prospects,Ngidi was schooled at Kwa-Zulu Natal's Hilton College  was involved at every provincial age-group level from Under-13 upwards
